blurb: Join us for a vibrant night at Lumen Field, Seattle's premier venue for large-scale events. On June 14, 2025, LSDREAM and Clozee will perform starting at 7:00 PM. The venue offers various parking options, but it's recommended to arrive early, especially on event nights, for the best spots.

Revolution Hall in Portland hosts an exciting night of punk rock with The Damned and The Avengers on June 15, 2025, at 8:00 PM. The venue is known for its intimate atmosphere, and there are plenty of nearby parking garages and public transport options.

address: 2700 N Vermont Ave, Los Angeles, CA 90027
blurb: The Greek Theatre in Los Angeles offers a scenic outdoor setting perfect for an evening of live music. On June 18, 2025, Band A, Band B, and Band C will perform starting at 7:30 PM. There are several parking lots nearby, but public transport is a convenient option given the venue's location.

Talking Stick Resort in Scottsdale, Arizona, will feature performances by Artist X and Artist Y on June 19, 2025, at 8:00 PM. The resort offers convenient parking and is located near multiple dining options, making it a great spot for a night out.

The Moody Center in Austin, Texas, will host Band Alpha on June 21, 2025, at 8:00 PM. This venue is known for its modern design and excellent acoustics. There are a variety of nearby parking options, and using public transportation is recommended if you're staying in the downtown area.

Experience authentic New Orleans jazz at Preservation Hall on June 22, 2025. The Jazz Collective will perform at 7:30 PM. Known for its intimate atmosphere, the venue has limited parking, so it's advised to use public transit or consider nearby street parking.

address: 887 West Marietta St NW STE C, Atlanta, GA 30318
blurb: Terminal West in Atlanta is the place to catch some of the best indie talent on June 23, 2025, with performances from Indie Stars at 8:00 PM. The venue offers street parking and paid lots nearby, but it's encouraged to arrive early for convenient spaces.

The Ritz in Raleigh welcomes Rock Legends for a night of classic rock on June 24, 2025. Show starts at 8:00 PM. There are parking lots available near the venue, but arriving early is recommended as it can get crowded on event nights.

Madison Square Garden will host Superstars Live on June 26, 2025, at 8:00 PM. This iconic venue is easily accessible via public transportation, and parking can be found in nearby garages. Expect an evening of top-tier performances in one of the world's most famous arenas.

TD Garden in Boston hosts local talent on June 27, 2025, with Boston Bands performing at 8:00 PM. Located in the heart of the city, the venue is easily accessible via public transport, and parking garages are available nearby, though they can fill up quickly.

Chicago's Wintrust Arena will feature The Midway and Chicago Blues on June 30, 2025. Doors open at 7:00 PM. The venue is in a bustling area with parking options nearby, but public transit can be a quicker alternative, especially during peak times.

The Filmore in Minneapolis will host The Minne Legends on July 1, 2025, at 8:00 PM. The venue offers a great mix of modern amenities and historic charm. Street parking and nearby lots are available, though public transport is often a more convenient choice in this busy area.

Red Rocks Amphitheatre is one of the most iconic venues in the world, and on July 3, 2025, you can catch Rocky Mountain Vibes perform at 7:30 PM. Plan ahead for parking as the venue fills up quickly, but the surrounding area offers great shuttle services to make getting to the show easy.
